metadata.title: USN-6170-1 -- Podman vulnerabilities
metadata.description: It was discovered that Podman incorrectly handled certain images. An attacker could possibly use this issue to pull an untrusted image.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-6170-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  podman - 3.4.4+ds1-1ubuntu1.22.04.1 podman-docker - 3.4.4+ds1-1ubuntu1.22.04.1 No subscription required
